DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect oral GS-6615 QTc interval healthy adult dofetilide-induced QTc prolongation .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Oral GS-6615 Dofetilide-Induced QT Prolongation , Safety , Tolerability Healthy Adults
